mapper.select: SELECT e.TrackingNumber as ee FROM PP_M_EngineeringExperiment e WHERE e.ValidFlag=1 AND e.OrderTask_FK = '980' AND e.EDTrackingNumber = #{ed}
select CASE e.Fab_FK WHEN 'KS1A' THEN 'ARRAY' WHEN 'KS1B' THEN 'CELL' WHEN 'KS1C' THEN 'LCM' ELSE '' END as plant FROM PP_M_EngineeringExperiment e WHERE e.ValidFlag=1 AND e.TrackingNumber = #{ee}

SELECT p.ProductCode1 as product, p.ProductCode2 as tft, p.ProductCode3 as cf, e.ExpQty as expQty FROM PP_D_EngineeringExperimentProduct p LEFT JOIN PP_M_EngineeringExperiment e on e.EngineeringExperiment_ID = p.EngineeringExperiment_FK WHERE p.ValidFlag=1 AND e.ValidFlag=1 AND e.TrackingNumber = #{ee}

SELECT m.MaterialGroup_FK as materialGroup, m.Material_FK as material, m.ActualQuality as expQty FROM PP_D_EngineeringExperimentMaterial m LEFT JOIN PP_D_EngineeringExperimentProduct p on p.EngineeringExperimentProduct_ID = m.EngineeringExperimentProduct_FK LEFT JOIN PP_M_EngineeringExperiment e on e.EngineeringExperiment_ID = p.EngineeringExperiment_FK WHERE m.ValidFlag=1 AND p.ValidFlag=1 AND e.ValidFlag=1 AND e.TrackingNumber = #{ee}

SELECT w.WorkOrderNumber as wo FROM PP_D_EngineeringExperimentWorderItem w LEFT JOIN PP_M_EngineeringExperiment e on e.EngineeringExperiment_ID = w.EngineeringExperiment_FK WHERE e.ValidFlag=1 AND w.ValidFlag=1 AND e.TrackingNumber = #{ee}
SELECT o.PRTrackingNumber FROM PP_M_OutsourceEngineeringExperiment o WHERE o.TrackingNumber=#{oee}

select m.TrackingNumber, d.Material_FK,d.Qty,d.RequestDate from SD_D_SampleItem d LEFT JOIN SD_M_SampleRequisition m on m.SampleRequisition_ID = d.SampleRequisition_FK where m.model_id = #{project} and m.OrderTask_FK='980' and d.ValidFlag=1 order by d.RequestDate

select case when costCenter_fk='M0002' then 'LCM1' when costCenter_fk='B3002' then 'LCM2' when costCenter_fk='B2200' then 'CELL' when costCenter_fk='B2100' then 'ARRAY' ELSE '' END fab, trackingNumber,scrapMoneyCny, dateOfOrder, userDepartment_fk, costCenter_fk from MM_M_WhScrap where userDepartment_fk in ('10000578','10000684') and costCenter_fk in ('M0002','B3002','B2100','B2200')
